Posts.Content: ConcernedSon1 wrote: Hello everyone I am so worried about my mother's condition. She did the mammogram first but her gynecologist ordered an ultrasound,founding out her left breast was dense. 3 days after she received a letter saying there was an ABNORMAL area and that she needed to come back. That is all what the letter said, will she have to do a biopsy? I am terrified that it might be something bad Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Abnormal area after ultrasound ConcernedSon1 GramM
